comment.author: 9476071@N03
comment._content: IS THE SPACE AGE OVER FOR AMERICANS? It may be so, if we don't do something to stop the cutting of funds to NASA. The manned program is already in the dog house. Great things like the Curiosity rover on Mars and the upcoming flyby of Pluto could be things of the past. We all should take prive in the fact that we are in another great age of exploration, like the on ein the 16th century. had europe given up on overseas exploration, western civilization would have stagnated like China did. This is why i encourage all Americans to write to their congressman to urge continued funding for NASA. Congressmenbers addresses can be found at: www.contactingcongress.org
